website_summaries.verdict: If you need a lightweight kayak for your kids, this is a relatively inexpensive good bet that performs well.
pros: Includes a lower back area to make it easier for your child to reboard the kayak
Lightweight – only 18 pounds, makes it easy for most kids to carry
Comes in blue, green, orange, pink, and yellow
cons: This kayak is really only for smaller children
There is not much space to grow

website_summaries.verdict: A good value on a wide and stable kayak that is easy for a kid to master.
pros: Includes a lower back portion that makes it easier to reenter from the water
cons: This kayak is only 6 feet long and may be too short for some children

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered it for our grandchildren and it is extremely stable. When I received photos, one child could stand upright on it and use it as a paddle board. On another photo actually three kids were in the boat and apparently if a kid is in the water he/she can easily climb back into the boat. So for young kids it is a winner. And it is also very light.
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Patharkar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Great for the lake and easy to use and maneuver by the 10 and 12 your old boys. The "solid" body was a comfort for my wife because she knew they'd never be stuck. After two years, they're still running strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Souser

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.text: These were birthday gifts for our 8 yr old twin grandsons. So far, they’ve been great. The boys are quite comfortable on these kayaks, which has enabled them to focus on learning how to paddle. We’ve kept them primarily on the calm waters of a tidal creek. They’ve enjoyed jumping off the kayaks and getting back on. Kayaks seem appropriately stable.
customer_reviews.author: PatM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 & 10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 & 10 year olds. Lightweight to carry. My only feedback is that there should be a place on the front to tie a rope to. I use a rope to connect them to my paddle board in case they drift too far away, but the only hook is on the side, which of course pulls them sideways, and if there is any current, it makes them feel as thought they will tip over. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Trevans

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner unit at a great price point.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this let's you get started without breaking the bank and find out if your kid is going to enjoy it or not. The unit is very stable on the water. It does have a bit of side to side pkay as you paddle, but at only 6 ft long, that is to be expected. Light enough for easy handling out of the water. After 10 minutes of trying it out, my daughter was totally adept at maneuvering on the water. I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Leach

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up after 3 or 4 times in the water!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different kayaks from two different suppliers and this one lasted about 3 or 4 times after putting it in the water. This kayak had a hole in it and it started leaking and almost sunk. The other one we bought for our grandson from a different manufacturer and supplier is still going strong after many uses and we bought them both at the same time. I was disappointed in this kayak. One other grandchild had to do without.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN M.

customer_reviews.title: Pairs perfectly with a swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect child’s kayak. Easy to get in and out of, nice size. My daughter prefers to our adult kayaks which are designed for staying dry. She likes to go on and off in the water. Pairs perfectly with a swim suit.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old grandson got this for his birthday. He was a little leary at first, but within 3 minutes, he was all over the lake! He keeps begging to come back and kayak more! So fun!!
customer_reviews.author: pds

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these kids' kayaks
customer_reviews.text: We have now ordered two of these kayaks for our 5 and 7 year olds. They are even better than we expected -- very much worth the price. I am glad that the paddle (the right size for kids) comes with it. We can haul them easily in our van. We have used them locally on a lake, then the kids took them on a day-long canoe trip north of where we live, and we have also used them during a family vacation to wester Maryland, where we had a room on a lake. In the summer, when the water is warm, the kids love jumping off of them, then climbing back on. The boats are extremely stable.
customer_reviews.author: Gweni

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for our 5 year old. Day 1 on the Lake and Day 2 was paddling solo on the river with current and adult supervison. This will be a hit with the kids for many years.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Fun starter kayak for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 11 year old - he loved it! A very simple and easy introduction to kayaking, he was moving about confidently within 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: M. Podolec

customer_reviews.title: YOUTH KAYAKS....WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: i purchased 4 of these kayaks for my 4 grandchildren (ages 5, 6, 7 9) and they all had a wonderful time using them. We "practiced" using the kayaks in the swimming pool so they would be comfortable using them before we took them out on the bay.....no issues at all. Highly recommend the youth kayaks....great way to have fun while getting in alot of good exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service!!
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is everything we had hoped. My little six year old grandson is enjoying it even in the swimming pool! He floats around practicing with the oar while his younger brother enjoys the ride! When we realized it had been mistakenly delivered to the wrong address the a Seller immediately sent another at expedited shipping. The Seller was SO helpful and I appreciate it greatly!
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Pam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 4th birthday. We took it out the day after his party. I tested it, and stood up on it, trying to tip it. It was so sturdy. Very light, he can manage it on his own. Excellent product, great price. Prior to this, he rode with me in my kayak. So happy with this purchase. Such a great gift idea and an excellent way to get outdoors with your child!
customer_reviews.author: bfrisque

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Both my boys ages 9 & 6 have one and use it daily! Super durable and work perfect! I can even get in it and paddle around!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa syperek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy child’s kayak
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. Seems sturdy. Will be light enough that we can easily carry it back and forth between the garage, car and beach. Excited to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is slightly longer and slightly wider than other cheaper models. Great for the wife and kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great ! My 8 year old loves it and learned to paddle immediately. Wont float w a adult.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Henry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Work great to introduce kids to kayaking. My boys love theirs stable and light. Only complaint is doesn't come with a seat and that is a big deal if you plan on spending a day on the water.
customer_reviews.author: beardedbassyaker

customer_reviews.title: Small and light
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Small enough to cart by bike I use it with my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very maneuverable.
customer_reviews.text: After a small hiccup in the process, I am very pleased with the kayak. (It’s a Christmas present for my granddaughter.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Fun City
customer_reviews.text: Grandson took it on its initial voyage and it wasn't long before he got the hang of it. Looking forward to coming back to see grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen John

customer_reviews.title: Great First Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our two kids aged 4 and 8. They both use it and it fits them perfectly. It's extremely hard to balance on as an adult, not that that is what it is for but it's fun trying!
customer_reviews.author: L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old grandson. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: We love these kayaks!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 4 1/2 and 7 1/2 they are both able to paddle these by themselves proficiently on flat water! The boats are very small and light, making them super easy to load on my roof rack! Both of my kids can also stand up on them and use them like a paddle board, this is somewhat tippy, but my kids are gymnasts with great balance, and have mastered it! Super fun boats, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Harris

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and small adults. Very stable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine K.

customer_reviews.title: These Kayaks are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It started with one wave kayak as a gift from grandma. My son was having way too much fun, so we just had to buy another. Before we knew it the whole family had a wave kayak. The wave kayaks are for you if you're into family fun, exercise and adventure. The 6-foot size is great for a child or an adult up to about 130 to 140 pounds. They are lightweight, portable, and easy to use (even for a 5 1/2 year old). We just love these kayaks and have found everyone we meet on the water loves them too - they have been popping up on the lake all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Nirak

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product for kids. Easy to carry. Our two grandchildren were over the moon with these.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed kayak
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Grand kids are safe. With life jackets of course too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. David Sievers

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it was my 9 yo son's birthday gift and he loved it. I recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Hugo de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase - our seven year old loves it!  Really easy to maneuver.  He got in and took off on his own, no instruction!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our seven year old to see if he could manage on his own. He loves it! Really easy to maneuver. He got in and took off on his own, no instruction! Best decision.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought 2. 1 for my 8 years old, 1 for my 10 years old. Both loved it. easy to pedal and very stable. it is also light, which I love, as I have to carry them...
customer_reviews.author: Bell William

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME kayak for my 50 pound 8-year-old
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kayak and a fabulous price. We took it out on a flat water lake today and my daughter had a blast! She is able to easily paddle this kayak turn and steer with no problems. She had a blast and so did I, just watching the smile on her face. This is a huge bargain considering it includes the paddle. It shipped quickly and arrived with no issues on our front steps in just a few days. Super happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 8 and 6 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and nice little kayak. Paddle seems to be of good quality as well. Now if the snow would just go away
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great can't wait to get out on the water and watch the kids have fun and splash water.WC
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids seem to love it, but they haven't had a chance to actually use them yet, They are itching for summer to get here
customer_reviews.author: clifford r artis iv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son was ecstatic to get his kayak. Color, price & availability were key. Look forward to this summer & our trips to the river.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old. Nice paddle. Long and wide.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Could not get the 6 year old off ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Could not get the 6 year old off it. Very stable, moves smoothly over the water. Can be carried in the car. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer teague

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my then 6, now nearly 8 year old son. Perfect learning kayak...will last for several years!! Definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Slim Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson to use at Cape. He loves it. Light enough for him to get off rack and drag to water by himself and he just turned 6. Very steady and safe invwater
customer_reviews.author: M S.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is better quality than i expected. It is kind of heavy but maybe i dont know what 18 lbs feels like. I really think my son will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 4 year old son and 6 year old daughter. Lots of fun, easy to use, great introduction to paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have bought on Amazon. It is well made and can be dragged over rugged terrain. It is easy to turn and maneuver. The kids figured out that it is stable enough to use as a paddle board. Overall this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Spartysenior

customer_reviews.title: The best $130 spent.
customer_reviews.text: This is what we all wish we had as kids! Better than other brands from local Sporting goods store. Buy one today!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal. My grandaughter loved it! Best Birthday present!!!! Can't wait to take her to the lake this summer to enjoy the water.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Look Forward to Letting our Kids Kayak with us
customer_reviews.text: THis was recommended to me by a co-worker. He said his kids used it from age 6 until 15. We purchased it on Amazon at a decent price and it arrived in a reasonable timeframe. The design is very clean, and looks like it will be quite durable. Our six year old is very excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 yr old cousin and she loves it - She can't wait to try it out on water! It looks very sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sosns and from the first time they used it they loved it. 7 and 5 and both can go on at once
customer_reviews.author: william roller

customer_reviews.title: I ordered Green and got blue - my son wasn't happy. However
customer_reviews.text: The kayak took a while to arrive. I ordered Green and got blue - my son wasn't happy. However, the kayak does function very well and my son enjoys it very much. To the sellers credit they did try to exchange the kayak for the right color but I didn't feel like going through the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jarett Reidnauer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, these small kayaks are great for the grandkids!! They are easily handled and manuvered by 7 and 9 year-olds. They are colourful and sturdy...highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy k Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Mima Makes Points with the Grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak for my Grandkids (ages 4 and 6). The quality is excellent, and the price included the paddle and the hand grip on the front of the kayak. The paddle is great for the six year old, a little long for the four year old. They tried it out in the swimming pool and had a great time with it. It's very stable. They can even stand on it, and jump off without tipping. We're taking it up to our cabin in the Sierra's and will be using it at Pinecrest Lake. I plan on adding a "tow" handle to my kayak so I can tow the "Wave" in case the kids get tired!
customer_reviews.author: Fit4Life

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for my child. Rounds out our family kayaking experience. Recommend for little ones only. The weight rating may be off.
customer_reviews.author: Cside

customer_reviews.title: only for still water.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely just for children and only for very still, safe waters.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my eight year old granddaughter and she loves it. It is exactly as it appeared on site. It came very quickly. This item can be used for bigger kids also and it appears to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Case of the cracked kayak
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had a blast using his kayak on the Deleware River behind our house for a time. But when I pulled it out for him it was so heavy with water inside that it was almost impossible. Finally on closer inspection we noticed a crack in along the seam in the back. At this point, I will be trying to get a replacement. It fills with water inside and is not safe!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Get Yours Today!
customer_reviews.text: We love this kayak. I bought this and another Lifetime Kayak for my 4 and 5 yr old boys, which they love. They are durable and cute. This particular model does come with the toggle handle to pull the kayak in and out of water - making it easy for little ones. Definitely worth a few more dollars for these pink/green/orange upgraded models. You'll be psyched. =)
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be in a better package when shipped,product is fine to use,has a piece broken but does'nt affect it.
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son this kayak so easy to maneuver. Fast delivery. Very affordable when cimpared to other brands. Fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Campbell

product_meta.title: Lifetime Youth 6 Feet Wave Kayak with Paddle
product_meta.description: The 6 foot Lifetime Wave Kayak is specifically designed for kids ages 5 and up, or up to 130 lbs. The wide stance provides a stable paddling platform to keep your child safely in the kayak. Its sloped back end and swim-up step allows the rider to easily re-enter the kayak from the water. With scupper holes, multiple footrest positions, and great stability, the Wave is perfect for kids recreational kayaking.
feature_bullets: Blow molded from High Density Polyethylene for superior strength and durability
Molded finger handles on each side of kayak for easy transport to and from the water
Swim-Up step allows rider to easily re-enter kayak from the water
Lightweight, 18 Lb Design, with 130 Lb Capacity; Designed for children 5 and up
